overview:
Avibha IT Solutions is a leading dual shore - US and India - outsource software product development and software testing company, based in Davis, CA and Pune, India. Using the Agile development method, we create cutting-edge software products exclusively for small to mid-size technology companies.

The company was formed in April 2006 and maintained a phenomenal growth over the years. Avibha achieved total financial stability since inception and grown solely based on internally generated funds.

We have believed in providing our customer’s with Best Price, Best Quality, Best Reliability and Best Support. Our strength is our customer base, their support, business relationship and advices which have helped us to get better by the day.

TEAM Avibha has a well qualified experienced team of 100 professionals that comprises of Dedicated Designers, Programmers, Marketing Executives and an experienced Administration. Our young and talented computer professionals are committed to quality output, and meet all the challenges to provide the ultimate. Our Web Developers and Software Developers have the expertise to take on any challenging work. Providing simple and user friendly solutions to complex needs.

VISION Our team is built upon a foundation of passion, creativity and vision. To provide world class, Consistently deliver comprehensive yet cost-effective IT solutions and services for global market by creating a Professionally stimulating and happy environment for our team where Professionals thrive alongside the growth of our company.
